tv.generator-info-name: WebGrab+Plus/w MDB & REX Postprocess -- version V3.2.0.0 -- Jan van Straaten

programme.title: French Kiss: O Beijo
programme.desc: Kate e Charlie têm a vida perfeita planeada: comprar casa, casar e ter filhos. O medo que Kate tem de voar leva a que fique no Canadá, e Charlie viaja até Paris para uma convenção. Ele apaixona-se por Juliette e põe termo à relação, o que faz com que Kate enfrente os medos e embarque num avião...

programme.title: Capitaine Marleau
programme.sub-title: Le Jeune Homme Et La Mort

programme.title: Embriagado de Amor
programme.desc: Os abusos constantes das sas sete irmãs de Barry Egan mantiveram-no sozinho e incapaz de se apaixonar. Detentor de um lado negro de raiva e violência, pode estar no limite, interiormente. É então que conhece Lena Leonard, uma mulher intensamente doce, mas misteriosa, e a sua viagem romântica começa.

programme.title: 11.6 - Desvio de Milhões
programme.desc: Um filme baseado na história verídica de Toni Musulin, motorista de uma carrinha de valores, que encenou um audacioso roubo, recorrendo à sua própria viatura de trabalho, que lhe valeu 11.6 milhões de euros, sem utilizar armas de fogo.

programme.title: A Soldier's Revenge
programme.desc: Perseguido pelos horrores da altura da guerra, o soldado da Guerra Civil transformado em caçador de prémios, Frank Connor, passa o seu tempo pós-guerra a acabar com duas coisas: uísque e fugitivos. Até que duas crianças desesperadas lhe tocam à porta e pedem ajuda para procurar a mãe desaparecida.

programme.title: A Experiência Belko
programme.desc: Numa retorcida experiência social, 80 americanos são trancados no edifício dos escritórios da sua empresa em Bogotá, na Colômbia. Entretanto, recebem ordens de uma voz misteriosa, que os instiga a participar num jogo mortal que implica matar ou ser morto...

programme.title: Operação Especial
programme.desc: Na Nigéria, no seguimento de um golpe de Estado, um grupo de soldados de elite americanos escoltam na selva uma médica e aldeãos ameaçados pelos rebeldes.

programme.title: Las Vegas
programme.sub-title: And Here's Mike With the Weather

programme.title: Profundo Azul
programme.desc: Quando procuram o tesouro de um pirata, quatro mergulhadores amadores descobrem um avião que contém uma grande quantidade de cocaína.

programme.title: Orgulho e Preconceito e Guerra
programme.desc: Um surto de zombies espalhou-se por Inglaterra, no século XIX. Cinco irmãs têm de lidar com a pressão de arranjar casamento, ao mesmo tempo que se protegem do cada vez mais intenso surto de mortos-vivos...

programme.title: Força Explosiva
programme.desc: Gabriel Yulaw tem de enfrentar um sinistro duplo de si próprio, vindo de um universo paralelo, que o quer matar. Uma batalha entre o Bem e o Mal que vai alterar a sua perceção da realidade e obrigá-lo a examinar a face maléfica da sua personalidade...

programme.title: O Massacre de Amityville
programme.desc: Baseado na história verídica de Ronald DeFeo Jr. que, em 1974, assassinou a sua família inteira com uma espingarda enquanto esta dormia. No seu julgamento, DeFeo alegou ter sido influenciado por "vozes" que ouvia dentro de casa.

programme.title: Dragões Americanos
programme.desc: Tony Luca é um detetive nova-iorquino que sem querer estraga o seu disfarce durante uma investigação à mafia. Este erro resulta numa transferência para o departamento de homicídios e o seu parceiro passa a ser Kim, da polícia de Seul. Inicialmente distantes, acabam por se tornar inseparáveis.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
Mentes Criminosas
programme.desc:
Criminal Minds: Created by Jeff Davis. With Matthew Gray Gubler, Kirsten Vangsness, A.J. Cook, Joe Mantegna. The cases of the F.B.I. Behavioral Analysis Unit (B.A.U.), an elite group of profilers who analyze the nation's most dangerous serial killers and individual heinous crimes in an effort to anticipate their next moves before they strike again." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0452046/","name":"Criminal Minds","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGE2ZmFkZTYtNjRiOS00ZjE3LThjOWMtZTViZjRmNDFjNTQwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"The cases of the F.B.I. Behavioral Analysis Unit (B.A.U.), an elite group of profilers who analyze the nation's most dangerous serial killers and individual heinous crimes in an effort to anticipate their next moves before they strik","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0452046/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Brkl30"},"dateCreated":"2005-12-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"Great Crime Drama","reviewBody":"Criminal Minds shows the viewers that it takes wits to beat the bad guys. The common link between CM & CSI is that the question of "How?" is always more interesting.

The only difference: CSI centers around physical evidence gathering & collecting the pieces to solve a puzzle.

Criminal Minds involves more psychology & sociology. We, as viewers, want to know what makes someone tick as a way to prevent crimes from occurring again.

Another reason why I enjoy this showed so much is how the characters put their expertise in play to solve some of the most twisted people around.

As casting is concerned: Patinkin is perfect as Jason Gideon. If you think about it, he's more like a professor citing famous lines from Einstein, Faulkner, etc.

When I first read those lines, it didn't make sense at first, but as you watch each episode , the lines that Gideon cites has more meaning to it.

For example: Einstein: "Imagination is more important than knowledge.Knowledge is limited. Imagination encircles the world." Gideon is saying that the human mind is the deadliest weapon of all, & we are capable of anything & everything of achieving all kinds of possibilities.

In conclusion, Criminal Minds is the kind the of show that anyone can enjoy."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":177823,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.1},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2005-09-22","keywords":"serial killer,serial murder,murder,21st century,2000s","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1131557/","name":"Matthew Gray Gubler"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1494536/","name":"Kirsten Vangsness"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0176882/","name":"A.J. Cook (role=Jennifer Jareau), Joe Mantegna (role=David Rossi), Thomas Gibson (role=Aaron Hotchner), Shemar Moore (role=Derek Morgan), Paget Brewster (role=Emily Prentiss), Aisha Tyler (role=Dr. Tara Lewis), Adam Rodriguez (role=Luke Alvez), Daniel Henney (role=Matt Simmons), Jeanne Tripplehorn (role=Alex Blake), Mandy Patinkin (role=Jason Gideon)

IMDb data; ttnr: 0452046, Title: Criminal Minds, --- Description: Criminal Minds: Created by Jeff Davis. With Matthew Gray Gubler, Kirsten Vangsness, A.J. Cook, Joe Mantegna. The cases of the F.B.I. Behavioral Analysis Unit (B.A.U.), an elite group of profilers who analyze the nation's most dangerous serial killers and individual heinous crimes in an effort to anticipate their next moves before they strike again." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0452046/","name":"Criminal Minds","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGE2ZmFkZTYtNjRiOS00ZjE3LThjOWMtZTViZjRmNDFjNTQwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"The cases of the F.B.I. Behavioral Analysis Unit (B.A.U.), an elite group of profilers who analyze the nation's most dangerous serial killers and individual heinous crimes in an effort to anticipate their next moves before they strik","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0452046/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Brkl30","dateCreated":"2005-12-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"Great Crime Drama","reviewBody":"Criminal Minds shows the viewers that it takes wits to beat the bad guys. The common link between CM & CSI is that the question of "How?" is always more interesting.

The only difference: CSI centers around physical evidence gathering & collecting the pieces to solve a puzzle.

Criminal Minds involves more psychology & sociology. We, as viewers, want to know what makes someone tick as a way to prevent crimes from occurring again.

Another reason why I enjoy this showed so much is how the characters put their expertise in play to solve some of the most twisted people around.

As casting is concerned: Patinkin is perfect as Jason Gideon. If you think about it, he's more like a professor citing famous lines from Einstein, Faulkner, etc.

When I first read those lines, it didn't make sense at first, but as you watch each episode , the lines that Gideon cites has more meaning to it.

For example: Einstein: "Imagination is more important than knowledge.Knowledge is limited. Imagination encircles the world." Gideon is saying that the human mind is the deadliest weapon of all, & we are capable of anything & everything of achieving all kinds of possibilities.

In conclusion, Criminal Minds is the kind the of show that anyone can enjoy.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":177823,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.1,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2005-09-22","keywords":"serial killer,serial murder,murder,21st century,2000s","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1131557/","name":"Matthew Gray Gubler","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1494536/","name":"Kirsten Vangsness","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0176882/","name":"A.J. programme.title: Criminal Minds
Mentes Criminosas
programme.desc:
Criminal Minds: Created by Jeff Davis. With Matthew Gray Gubler, Kirsten Vangsness, A.J. Cook, Joe Mantegna. The cases of the F.B.I. Behavioral Analysis Unit (B.A.U.), an elite group of profilers who analyze the nation's most dangerous serial killers and individual heinous crimes in an effort to anticipate their next moves before they strike again." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0452046/","name":"Criminal Minds","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGE2ZmFkZTYtNjRiOS00ZjE3LThjOWMtZTViZjRmNDFjNTQwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"The cases of the F.B.I. Behavioral Analysis Unit (B.A.U.), an elite group of profilers who analyze the nation's most dangerous serial killers and individual heinous crimes in an effort to anticipate their next moves before they strik","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0452046/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Brkl30"},"dateCreated":"2005-12-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"Great Crime Drama","reviewBody":"Criminal Minds shows the viewers that it takes wits to beat the bad guys. The common link between CM & CSI is that the question of "How?" is always more interesting.

The only difference: CSI centers around physical evidence gathering & collecting the pieces to solve a puzzle.

Criminal Minds involves more psychology & sociology. We, as viewers, want to know what makes someone tick as a way to prevent crimes from occurring again.

Another reason why I enjoy this showed so much is how the characters put their expertise in play to solve some of the most twisted people around.

As casting is concerned: Patinkin is perfect as Jason Gideon. If you think about it, he's more like a professor citing famous lines from Einstein, Faulkner, etc.

When I first read those lines, it didn't make sense at first, but as you watch each episode , the lines that Gideon cites has more meaning to it.

For example: Einstein: "Imagination is more important than knowledge.Knowledge is limited. Imagination encircles the world." Gideon is saying that the human mind is the deadliest weapon of all, & we are capable of anything & everything of achieving all kinds of possibilities.

In conclusion, Criminal Minds is the kind the of show that anyone can enjoy."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":177823,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.1},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2005-09-22","keywords":"serial killer,serial murder,murder,21st century,2000s","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1131557/","name":"Matthew Gray Gubler"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1494536/","name":"Kirsten Vangsness"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0176882/","name":"A.J. IMDb data; ttnr: 0452046, Title: Criminal Minds, --- Description: Criminal Minds: Created by Jeff Davis. With Matthew Gray Gubler, Kirsten Vangsness, A.J. Cook, Joe Mantegna. The cases of the F.B.I. Behavioral Analysis Unit (B.A.U.), an elite group of profilers who analyze the nation's most dangerous serial killers and individual heinous crimes in an effort to anticipate their next moves before they strike again." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0452046/","name":"Criminal Minds","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGE2ZmFkZTYtNjRiOS00ZjE3LThjOWMtZTViZjRmNDFjNTQwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"The cases of the F.B.I. Behavioral Analysis Unit (B.A.U.), an elite group of profilers who analyze the nation's most dangerous serial killers and individual heinous crimes in an effort to anticipate their next moves before they strik","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0452046/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Brkl30","dateCreated":"2005-12-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"Great Crime Drama","reviewBody":"Criminal Minds shows the viewers that it takes wits to beat the bad guys. The common link between CM & CSI is that the question of "How?" is always more interesting.

The only difference: CSI centers around physical evidence gathering & collecting the pieces to solve a puzzle.

Criminal Minds involves more psychology & sociology. We, as viewers, want to know what makes someone tick as a way to prevent crimes from occurring again.

Another reason why I enjoy this showed so much is how the characters put their expertise in play to solve some of the most twisted people around.

As casting is concerned: Patinkin is perfect as Jason Gideon. If you think about it, he's more like a professor citing famous lines from Einstein, Faulkner, etc.

When I first read those lines, it didn't make sense at first, but as you watch each episode , the lines that Gideon cites has more meaning to it.

For example: Einstein: "Imagination is more important than knowledge.Knowledge is limited. Imagination encircles the world." Gideon is saying that the human mind is the deadliest weapon of all, & we are capable of anything & everything of achieving all kinds of possibilities.

In conclusion, Criminal Minds is the kind the of show that anyone can enjoy.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":177823,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.1,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2005-09-22","keywords":"serial killer,serial murder,murder,21st century,2000s","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1131557/","name":"Matthew Gray Gubler","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1494536/","name":"Kirsten Vangsness","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0176882/","name":"A.J. programme.title: Dois Tiros
programme.desc: Bobby Trench, agente da DEA, e Marcus Stigman, um oficial da Marinha, são dois agentes duplos numa missão que envolve uma das mais implacáveis máfias mexicanas. Nenhum deles sabe a verdadeira identidade do companheiro, uma vez que um dos objetivos é vigiar e investigar os movimentos do outro.

programme.title: Transporter: Potência Máxima
programme.desc: Frank Martin, um ex-mercenário, vive uma vida menos perigosa, transportando pacotes confidenciais. No entanto, quando o pai de Frank o visita, este vê-se envolvido no assalto do século por uma astuta mulher fatal e pelas suas três sedutoras ajudantes.

programme.title: Assalto a Londres
programme.desc: O funeral do primeiro-ministro britânico torna-se o evento mais protegido de sempre, mas também uma oportunidade para matar líderes poderosos. Apenas três pessoas o podem impedir: o presidente dos EUA, os Serviços Secretos americanos e um agente do MI6.

programme.title: Criminal Minds

programme.desc:
Criminal Minds: Created by Jeff Davis. With Matthew Gray Gubler, Kirsten Vangsness, A.J. Cook, Joe Mantegna. The cases of the F.B.I. Behavioral Analysis Unit (B.A.U.), an elite group of profilers who analyze the nation's most dangerous serial killers and individual heinous crimes in an effort to anticipate their next moves before they strike again." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0452046/","name":"Criminal Minds","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGE2ZmFkZTYtNjRiOS00ZjE3LThjOWMtZTViZjRmNDFjNTQwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"The cases of the F.B.I. Behavioral Analysis Unit (B.A.U.), an elite group of profilers who analyze the nation's most dangerous serial killers and individual heinous crimes in an effort to anticipate their next moves before they strik","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0452046/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Brkl30"},"dateCreated":"2005-12-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"Great Crime Drama","reviewBody":"Criminal Minds shows the viewers that it takes wits to beat the bad guys. The common link between CM & CSI is that the question of "How?" is always more interesting.

The only difference: CSI centers around physical evidence gathering & collecting the pieces to solve a puzzle.

Criminal Minds involves more psychology & sociology. We, as viewers, want to know what makes someone tick as a way to prevent crimes from occurring again.

Another reason why I enjoy this showed so much is how the characters put their expertise in play to solve some of the most twisted people around.

As casting is concerned: Patinkin is perfect as Jason Gideon. If you think about it, he's more like a professor citing famous lines from Einstein, Faulkner, etc.

When I first read those lines, it didn't make sense at first, but as you watch each episode , the lines that Gideon cites has more meaning to it.

For example: Einstein: "Imagination is more important than knowledge.Knowledge is limited. Imagination encircles the world." Gideon is saying that the human mind is the deadliest weapon of all, & we are capable of anything & everything of achieving all kinds of possibilities.

In conclusion, Criminal Minds is the kind the of show that anyone can enjoy."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":177823,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.1},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2005-09-22","keywords":"serial killer,serial murder,murder,21st century,2000s","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1131557/","name":"Matthew Gray Gubler"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1494536/","name":"Kirsten Vangsness"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0176882/","name":"A.J. Behavioral Analysis Unit (B.A.U.), an elite group of profilers who analyze the nation's most dangerous serial killers and individual heinous crimes in an effort to anticipate their next moves before they strike again." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0452046/","name":"Criminal Minds","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGE2ZmFkZTYtNjRiOS00ZjE3LThjOWMtZTViZjRmNDFjNTQwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"The cases of the F.B.I. Behavioral Analysis Unit (B.A.U.), an elite group of profilers who analyze the nation's most dangerous serial killers and individual heinous crimes in an effort to anticipate their next moves before they strik","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0452046/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Brkl30"},"dateCreated":"2005-12-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"Great Crime Drama","reviewBody":"Criminal Minds shows the viewers that it takes wits to beat the bad guys. The common link between CM & CSI is that the question of "How?" is always more interesting.

The only difference: CSI centers around physical evidence gathering & collecting the pieces to solve a puzzle.

Criminal Minds involves more psychology & sociology. We, as viewers, want to know what makes someone tick as a way to prevent crimes from occurring again.

Another reason why I enjoy this showed so much is how the characters put their expertise in play to solve some of the most twisted people around.

As casting is concerned: Patinkin is perfect as Jason Gideon. If you think about it, he's more like a professor citing famous lines from Einstein, Faulkner, etc.

When I first read those lines, it didn't make sense at first, but as you watch each episode , the lines that Gideon cites has more meaning to it.

For example: Einstein: "Imagination is more important than knowledge.Knowledge is limited. Imagination encircles the world." Gideon is saying that the human mind is the deadliest weapon of all, & we are capable of anything & everything of achieving all kinds of possibilities.

In conclusion, Criminal Minds is the kind the of show that anyone can enjoy."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":177823,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.1},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2005-09-22","keywords":"serial killer,serial murder,murder,21st century,2000s","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1131557/","name":"Matthew Gray Gubler"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1494536/","name":"Kirsten Vangsness"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0176882/","name":"A.J. programme.title: Criminal Minds
Mentes Criminosas
programme.desc:
Criminal Minds: Created by Jeff Davis. With Matthew Gray Gubler, Kirsten Vangsness, A.J. Cook, Joe Mantegna. The cases of the F.B.I. Behavioral Analysis Unit (B.A.U.), an elite group of profilers who analyze the nation's most dangerous serial killers and individual heinous crimes in an effort to anticipate their next moves before they strike again." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0452046/","name":"Criminal Minds","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGE2ZmFkZTYtNjRiOS00ZjE3LThjOWMtZTViZjRmNDFjNTQwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"The cases of the F.B.I. Behavioral Analysis Unit (B.A.U.), an elite group of profilers who analyze the nation's most dangerous serial killers and individual heinous crimes in an effort to anticipate their next moves before they strik","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0452046/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Brkl30"},"dateCreated":"2005-12-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"Great Crime Drama","reviewBody":"Criminal Minds shows the viewers that it takes wits to beat the bad guys. The common link between CM & CSI is that the question of "How?" is always more interesting.

The only difference: CSI centers around physical evidence gathering & collecting the pieces to solve a puzzle.

Criminal Minds involves more psychology & sociology. We, as viewers, want to know what makes someone tick as a way to prevent crimes from occurring again.

Another reason why I enjoy this showed so much is how the characters put their expertise in play to solve some of the most twisted people around.

As casting is concerned: Patinkin is perfect as Jason Gideon. If you think about it, he's more like a professor citing famous lines from Einstein, Faulkner, etc.

When I first read those lines, it didn't make sense at first, but as you watch each episode , the lines that Gideon cites has more meaning to it.

For example: Einstein: "Imagination is more important than knowledge.Knowledge is limited. Imagination encircles the world." Gideon is saying that the human mind is the deadliest weapon of all, & we are capable of anything & everything of achieving all kinds of possibilities.

In conclusion, Criminal Minds is the kind the of show that anyone can enjoy."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":177823,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.1},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2005-09-22","keywords":"serial killer,serial murder,murder,21st century,2000s","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1131557/","name":"Matthew Gray Gubler"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1494536/","name":"Kirsten Vangsness"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0176882/","name":"A.J. Cook"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0067205/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0066107/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0085751/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1471491/","name":"Jeff Davis"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Criminal Minds: Drive","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2969812249","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTI5MmQ5NjctOWM2OS00NDMxLWFlNmYtZTAzNGFkMjIzZmUyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTI5MmQ5NjctOWM2OS00NDMxLWFlNmYtZTAzNGFkMjIzZmUyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Criminal Minds: Drive"}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Dredd
programme.desc: Numa cidade violenta e futurista, Dredd é o derradeiro juiz e está determinado a salvar a cidade do seu mais recente flagelo: uma perigosa droga, que permite aos seus utilizadores experimentarem a realidade numa fração da sua velocidade normal.

programme.title: Mechanic: Assassino Profissional
programme.desc: Quando Arthur Bishop julgava que os seus dias como assassino eram coisa do passado, é forçado a voltar ao ativo quando Gina, o amor da sua vida, é raptada pelo seu inimigo mais perigoso. Mas na mira estão nomes, aparentemente, impossíveis de eliminar.

programme.title: Need For Speed: O Filme
programme.desc: Tobey Marshall é piloto de corridas automóveis clandestinas, até que é preso injustamente. Quando é libertado, só tem uma ideia em mente: vingança. Mesmo pondo em causa os valores que sempre seguiu, Tobey só quer derrubar os seus inimigos.

programme.title: Money Monster
programme.desc: Lee Gates, um apresentador de televisão que é uma espécie de "guru" de Wall Street, é mantido refém com a sua equipa e produtora, durante a emissão do seu programa em direto, por um investidor irado. Em tempo real, terão de encontrar forma de se manterem vivos e desvendarem uma teia de mentiras.

programme.title: A Rede Social
programme.desc: Em 2003, Mark Zuckerberg, um aluno de Harvard, senta-se ao computador e começa a trabalhar numa nova ideia, que se transformaria na maior rede social à escala mundial: o Facebook. Contudo, o sucesso trouxe-lhe também problemas pessoais e legais.

programme.title: Soldado Milhões
programme.desc: Aníbal Augusto Milhais é um soldado português da Primeira Guerra Mundial. Na Batalha de La Lys, contrariando ordens superiores, enfrenta sozinho sucessivas ofensivas alemãs de maneira a garantir a retirada dos companheiros.

programme.title: Olha Quem Fala... Também
programme.desc: Mickey tem agora três anos e uma irmã mais nova, que nem sempre é fácil de aturar e contentar. Entretanto, os seus pais debatem-se com diversos problemas familiares.

programme.title: Bleed For This - A Força de um Campeão
programme.desc: A incrível história verídica do campeão mundial de boxe Vinny Pazienza. Na sequência de um grave acidente, quase fatal, ficou com a coluna fraturada e sem esperanças de voltar a andar. Mas, contra todas as probabilidades e recomendações médicas, ele recomeça a treinar...

programme.title: Falsas Aparências
programme.desc: Nick é dentista no Canadá, onde luta para garantir o sustento da família. Quando chega um novo morador ao bairro, Nick descobre que o vizinho é Jimmy "A Tulipa" Teduski. A mulher de Nick convence-o a ir a Chicago, informar o padrinho da Máfia que quer ver Jimmy morto.

programme.title: Jack e Jill
programme.desc: Jack é um publicitário de sucesso em L.A., com uma bela esposa e filhos, que receia todos os anos o mesmo evento: a visita da irmã gémea no dia de Ação de Graças. A necessitada e passivo-agressiva Jill enlouquece Jack, virando a sua vida do avesso.

programme.title: Olha Quem Fala... Também
programme.desc: Mickey tem agora três anos e uma irmã mais nova, que nem sempre é fácil de aturar e contentar. Entretanto, os seus pais debatem-se com diversos problemas familiares.

programme.title: Roman J. Israel, Esq.
programme.desc: Roman Israel é um advogado idealista que faz de tudo por um julgamento justo. Mas quando é demitido, aceita o convite de outra firma, com a promessa de uma vida de luxo. No entanto, Israel descobre um esquema de bastidores que precisa de medidas extremas...

programme.title: 8mm
programme.desc: Quando o detetive privado Tom Wells descobre um pequeno filme de 8 mm, a sua vivência tranquila acaba, e é encarregue de descobrir se é autêntico ou não. À medida que se embrenha na investigação, fica cada vez mais obcecado, provocando o afastamento progressivo da sua família e dos que o rodeiam.

programme.title: Um Homem No Limite
programme.desc: Nick Cassidy era um polícia honesto, que foi preso por um crime que cometeu. Desesperado, consegue fugir e sobe a um arranha-céus, ameaçando atirar-se dali...

programme.title: Terra Chama Echo
programme.desc: Um grupo de amigos começa a receber mensagens estranhas nos telemóveis, mas os pais e as autoridades não dão importância a essas frases codificadas. Por sua conta e risco, os jovens embarcam numa aventura e descobrem um extraterrestre que precisa da sua ajuda.

programme.title: Um Pai à Maneira
programme.desc: Sonny Kaufax é um adulto irresponsável. À medida que os amigos casam, percebe que, se não fizer nada, a sua vida vai ser sempre assim. Quando a namorada o deixa, toma uma medida drástica: adota Julian, um menino que foi abandonado à sua porta. Sem qualquer experiência, resolve criá-lo à sua maneira.

programme.title: O Melga
programme.desc: Um desconhecido, com um caráter extravagante e um pouco inquietante, intromete-se na vida de um jovem arquiteto de quem se quer tornar o melhor amigo.

programme.title: Linha Mortal
programme.desc: Cinco estudantes de Medicina, obcecados com o mistério que rodeia os limites da vida, embarcam numa perigosa experiência. Devem parar o coração durante pequenos períodos de tempo, mas estas experiências perigosas trazem consequências sobrenaturais.

programme.title: Um Ano Muito Violento
programme.desc: Em Nova Iorque, o inverno de 1981 foi, estatisticamente, o ano mais perigoso na história da cidade. Neste contexto, um casal procura manter o seu negócio por entre o labirinto político e corrupção industrial das ruas de uma cidade em decadência.

programme.title: O Primeiro Encontro
programme.desc: Quando 12 naves espaciais aterram em vários pontos do globo, a especialista em linguística Louise Banks é integrada numa equipa de elite. Com a guerra em "stand by", cabe a Louise tentar comunicar com os alienígenas. Ela espera resolver o mistério, mas pode colocar em risco a própria Humanidade.

programme.title: Mulheres do Século XX
programme.desc: A vida de Dorothea Fields, uma mãe solteira na casa dos 50, que cuida do seu filho adolescente numa época de mudanças culturais. Dorothea conta com a ajuda de duas mulheres mais novas, Abbie, uma artista punk, e Julie, uma provocadora adolescente.

programme.title: Money Monster
programme.desc: Lee Gates, um apresentador de televisão que é uma espécie de "guru" de Wall Street, é mantido refém com a sua equipa e produtora, durante a emissão do seu programa em direto, por um investidor irado. Em tempo real, terão de encontrar forma de se manterem vivos e desvendarem uma teia de mentiras.

programme.title: Eu, Tonya
programme.desc: A história de como Tonya Harding, uma patinadora artística americana, viu o seu futuro desportivo em risco, quando se viu envolvida num violento ataque à sua rival, Nancy Kerrigan. Um retrato absurdo, trágico e hilariante.

programme.title: Um Pai à Maneira
programme.desc: Sonny Kaufax é um adulto irresponsável. À medida que os amigos casam, percebe que, se não fizer nada, a sua vida vai ser sempre assim. Quando a namorada o deixa, toma uma medida drástica: adota Julian, um menino que foi abandonado à sua porta. Sem qualquer experiência, resolve criá-lo à sua maneira.

programme.title: X-Men: O Início
programme.desc: Antes de os mutantes revelarem a sua existência ao mundo, ou de Charles Xavier e Erik Lehnsherr se transformarem em Professor X e Magneto, eles eram apenas dois jovens a tentar controlar os seus poderes. A dupla trabalhava com mais mutantes, tentando vencer a maior ameaça que o mundo já enfrentara.

programme.title: A Fantástica Aventura do Barão
programme.desc: Quem é o barão? Um mentiroso? Um charlatão? Um louco? Ou o maior super-herói de todos os tempos, que lutou e venceu os mais disparatados combates? No séc. XVII, o fabuloso Barão Munchausen e os seus homens tentam defender a sua cidade da invasão turca.

programme.title: Sete Anos no Tibete
programme.desc: Heinrich Harrer, um alpinista austríaco, tenta, em 1939, subir os Himalaias e trava conhecimento com o jovem Dalai Lama. Ele e o seu companheiro Peter são os únicos dois estrangeiros a pisar a cidade sagrada de Lhasa. Esta viagem leva-os a testemunhar um momento marcante da história do Tibete.

programme.title: Vingança Sem Rosto
programme.desc: Um cientista vê mais do que devia e é vítima disso, ficando com o corpo todo queimado. Entretanto, resolve implantar em si a pele artificial em que trabalhava e que permite modelar qualquer tipo de rosto. Dá então início à sua vingança.

programme.title: Acção Total
programme.desc: Jackie é um adorado chefe de televisão que se vê perseguido por um grupo ligado à droga, uma vez que este julga ser ele o possuidor de uma cassete que o pode comprometer. Claro que tudo não passa de um mal entendido...

programme.title: O Homem do Coração de Ferro
programme.desc: A ascensão meteórica de Reinhard Heydrich, até ser um dos principais líderes do regime de Hitler. Iniciado na ideologia Nazi pela esposa, uma aristocrata que o acompanhou na ascensão ao poder, Heydrich foi o principal arquiteto da "Solução Final".

programme.title: Magia e Sedução
programme.desc: Sally e Gillian Owens são duas irmãs descendentes de uma família de bruxas que carrega uma maldição centenária. Agora, têm de enfrentar vários feitiços inesperados e ultrapassar todos os obstáculos para encontrarem o verdadeiro amor.

programme.title: Candice Renoir
Candice Renoir
programme.sub-title: L'Homme Est Un Loup Pour L'Homme
programme.desc:
Candice Renoir: Created by Robin Barataud, Brigitte Peskine, Solen Roy-Pagenault. With Cécile Bois, Raphaël Lenglet, Clara Antoons, Ali Marhyar. The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine is between solving crimes, taking out fights with her much younger female police superior officer, getting her kids to school - in addition - handling their problems too and keeping her team in line. It's a very funny and witty series with a lot of french charm and intelligent story writing. Not another dull crime series all over again. It's like a fresh french breeze on the TV screen. Candice is like a female Columbo version in high heels, handbag pink scarf and a 9mm in her holster." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2819924/","name":"Candice Renoir","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM3YzUxM2UtZjIyMC00Zjg5LTk0NTMtNGQ3ZWQ0ODhlMTJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc0NTExNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine ","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2819924/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Doctor_Dexter"},"dateCreated":"2016-06-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"The female sitcom-detective cliché","reviewBody":"Over the last decades, in Europe, we've been swamped with the older female detective character with a family in tow. Some have a weak excuse for a husband to emphasise their strength, many others are independent single mothers who struggle with a demanding job and raising their kids. To be honest, I'm not a fan of the genre. Nothing against strong and independent women, au contraire. I just prefer decent detective work above being sucked into the personal life of a fictional character. If I wanted to see family drama I'd go watch a sitcom. It's beyond me why the detective genre has to be muddled with sitcom-esque fluff like this. (I wouldn't buy it, but it's programmed on TV *instead* of a proper detective). I can accept a modest degree of family life. After all, Beck and Wallander have families too. However, they are primarily detectives, and every episode is about solving the case. 

"Candice Renoir" is more sitcom than detectives. And it's just as tacky and kitschy as the name already suggests. A fifty-something big mama, who seems to think she's Brigitte Bardot in the seventies, miraculously becomes the team leader of a small town detective team. She blunders through everything, but 'magically' finds clues in fashion magazines and the likes. She's supposed to portray the strong and independent older woman who can do it all, kids and playing the boss- detective, but it's way to contrived to be the least bit believable. Her character, the rainbow team, the younger cutesy neighbour - who has stamped "love interest" in all caps across his handsome forehead - it's all a stylised light version of a concept we've seen many, many times before. And now it's here again, only worse. Yay. 

To be fair, the acting of the team and other characters varies from passable to decent, but the lead actress is really milking the diva character, and as such, overacting horribly in just about every scene.

It might just about do as daytime TV, on a rainy afternoon, but that's probably me being generous.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":1}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1069,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5},"contentRating":"TV-G","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2013-04-19","keywords":"france,female police officer,police","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0092291/","name":"Cécile Bois"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0501845/","name":"Raphaël Lenglet"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6511436/","name":"Clara Antoons"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0011107/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0053077/","name":"Robin Barataud"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0043904/","name":"Brigitte Peskine"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2784794/","name":"Solen Roy-Pagenault"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Promo Bande-annonce [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2892283161","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FhNWFlYmItYmE5My00ZmM0LThlZDctZGE5YjhiMThkZDQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FhNWFlYmItYmE5My00ZmM0LThlZDctZGE5YjhiMThkZDQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""}}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 2819924, Title: Candice Renoir, --- Description: Candice Renoir: Created by Robin Barataud, Brigitte Peskine, Solen Roy-Pagenault. With Cécile Bois, Raphaël Lenglet, Clara Antoons, Ali Marhyar. The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine is between solving crimes, taking out fights with her much younger female police superior officer, getting her kids to school - in addition - handling their problems too and keeping her team in line. It's a very funny and witty series with a lot of french charm and intelligent story writing. Not another dull crime series all over again. It's like a fresh french breeze on the TV screen. Candice is like a female Columbo version in high heels, handbag pink scarf and a 9mm in her holster." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2819924/","name":"Candice Renoir","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM3YzUxM2UtZjIyMC00Zjg5LTk0NTMtNGQ3ZWQ0ODhlMTJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc0NTExNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine ","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2819924/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Doctor_Dexter","dateCreated":"2016-06-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"The female sitcom-detective cliché","reviewBody":"Over the last decades, in Europe, we've been swamped with the older female detective character with a family in tow. Some have a weak excuse for a husband to emphasise their strength, many others are independent single mothers who struggle with a demanding job and raising their kids. To be honest, I'm not a fan of the genre. Nothing against strong and independent women, au contraire. I just prefer decent detective work above being sucked into the personal life of a fictional character. If I wanted to see family drama I'd go watch a sitcom. It's beyond me why the detective genre has to be muddled with sitcom-esque fluff like this. (I wouldn't buy it, but it's programmed on TV *instead* of a proper detective). I can accept a modest degree of family life. After all, Beck and Wallander have families too. However, they are primarily detectives, and every episode is about solving the case. 

"Candice Renoir" is more sitcom than detectives. And it's just as tacky and kitschy as the name already suggests. A fifty-something big mama, who seems to think she's Brigitte Bardot in the seventies, miraculously becomes the team leader of a small town detective team. She blunders through everything, but 'magically' finds clues in fashion magazines and the likes. She's supposed to portray the strong and independent older woman who can do it all, kids and playing the boss- detective, but it's way to contrived to be the least bit believable. Her character, the rainbow team, the younger cutesy neighbour - who has stamped "love interest" in all caps across his handsome forehead - it's all a stylised light version of a concept we've seen many, many times before. And now it's here again, only worse. Yay. 

To be fair, the acting of the team and other characters varies from passable to decent, but the lead actress is really milking the diva character, and as such, overacting horribly in just about every scene.

It might just about do as daytime TV, on a rainy afternoon, but that's probably me being generous.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":1,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1069,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5,"contentRating":"TV-G","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2013-04-19","keywords":"france,female police officer,police","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0092291/","name":"Cécile Bois","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0501845/","name":"Raphaël Lenglet","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6511436/","name":"Clara Antoons"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0011107/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0053077/","name":"Robin Barataud","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0043904/","name":"Brigitte Peskine","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2784794/","name":"Solen Roy-Pagenault"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Promo Bande-annonce [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2892283161","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FhNWFlYmItYmE5My00ZmM0LThlZDctZGE5YjhiMThkZDQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FhNWFlYmItYmE5My00ZmM0LThlZDctZGE5YjhiMThkZDQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""</script><metacontent=" --- Director: Pascal Lahmani, Nicolas Picard-Dreyfuss, Stéphane Malhuret, Olivier Barma, Raphaël Lenglet

programme.title: Hailey Dean Mystery: Homicídio, Com Amor
programme.desc: Hailey Dean, uma antiga procuradora do Ministério Público, é agora psicoterapeuta. Quando uma paciente sua é interrogada sobre as mortes repentinas dos seus pais, o antigo trabalho de Hailey revela-se útil para provar a sua inocência.

programme.title: Hailey Dean Mystery: Herança Fatal
programme.desc: Hailey, uma antiga procuradora do Ministério Público, utiliza as suas competências e os seus contactos quando a sua amiga Pam desaparece enquanto tratava de vender a grande propriedade dos pais, já falecidos.

programme.title: Professor Marston e as Mulheres Maravilha
programme.desc: A história do psicólogo William Moulton Marston e da sua relação poliamorosa com a sua mulher e a amante de ambos, que inspiraria a criação da super-heroína Mulher-Maravilha.

IMDb data; ttnr: 2819924, Title: Candice Renoir, --- Description: Candice Renoir: Created by Robin Barataud, Brigitte Peskine, Solen Roy-Pagenault. With Cécile Bois, Raphaël Lenglet, Clara Antoons, Ali Marhyar. The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine is between solving crimes, taking out fights with her much younger female police superior officer, getting her kids to school - in addition - handling their problems too and keeping her team in line. It's a very funny and witty series with a lot of french charm and intelligent story writing. Not another dull crime series all over again. It's like a fresh french breeze on the TV screen. Candice is like a female Columbo version in high heels, handbag pink scarf and a 9mm in her holster." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2819924/","name":"Candice Renoir","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM3YzUxM2UtZjIyMC00Zjg5LTk0NTMtNGQ3ZWQ0ODhlMTJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc0NTExNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine ","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2819924/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Doctor_Dexter","dateCreated":"2016-06-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"The female sitcom-detective cliché","reviewBody":"Over the last decades, in Europe, we've been swamped with the older female detective character with a family in tow. Some have a weak excuse for a husband to emphasise their strength, many others are independent single mothers who struggle with a demanding job and raising their kids. To be honest, I'm not a fan of the genre. Nothing against strong and independent women, au contraire. I just prefer decent detective work above being sucked into the personal life of a fictional character. If I wanted to see family drama I'd go watch a sitcom. It's beyond me why the detective genre has to be muddled with sitcom-esque fluff like this. (I wouldn't buy it, but it's programmed on TV *instead* of a proper detective). I can accept a modest degree of family life. After all, Beck and Wallander have families too. However, they are primarily detectives, and every episode is about solving the case. 

"Candice Renoir" is more sitcom than detectives. And it's just as tacky and kitschy as the name already suggests. A fifty-something big mama, who seems to think she's Brigitte Bardot in the seventies, miraculously becomes the team leader of a small town detective team. She blunders through everything, but 'magically' finds clues in fashion magazines and the likes. She's supposed to portray the strong and independent older woman who can do it all, kids and playing the boss- detective, but it's way to contrived to be the least bit believable. Her character, the rainbow team, the younger cutesy neighbour - who has stamped "love interest" in all caps across his handsome forehead - it's all a stylised light version of a concept we've seen many, many times before. And now it's here again, only worse. Yay. 

To be fair, the acting of the team and other characters varies from passable to decent, but the lead actress is really milking the diva character, and as such, overacting horribly in just about every scene.

It might just about do as daytime TV, on a rainy afternoon, but that's probably me being generous.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":1,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1069,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5,"contentRating":"TV-G","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2013-04-19","keywords":"france,female police officer,police","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0092291/","name":"Cécile Bois","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0501845/","name":"Raphaël Lenglet","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6511436/","name":"Clara Antoons"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0011107/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0053077/","name":"Robin Barataud","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0043904/","name":"Brigitte Peskine","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2784794/","name":"Solen Roy-Pagenault"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Promo Bande-annonce [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2892283161","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FhNWFlYmItYmE5My00ZmM0LThlZDctZGE5YjhiMThkZDQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FhNWFlYmItYmE5My00ZmM0LThlZDctZGE5YjhiMThkZDQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""</script><metacontent=" --- Director: Pascal Lahmani, Nicolas Picard-Dreyfuss, Stéphane Malhuret, Olivier Barma, Raphaël Lenglet

programme.title: Linhas Cruzadas
programme.desc: Três irmãs unem-se ao aproximar-se a morte do pai, com o qual não tinham uma ligação forte.

programme.title: Querida Eleanor
programme.desc: Em 1962, durante o caos da crise dos mísseis em Cuba, duas adolescentes viajam através dos Estados Unidos em busca de Eleanor Roosevelt.

programme.title: Ligações Selvagens II
programme.desc: Quando morre o padrasto milionário de Brittney Harvers, a sua vida de luxo parece ter acabado. Mas as coisas mudam quando Maya, a sua companheira, inicia uma busca ao dinheiro do defunto. Num jogo em que vale tudo, as duas jovens iniciam uma batalha que as leva para uma estranha relação.

programme.title: Candice Renoir

programme.sub-title: La Plus Belle Fille Ne Peut Donner Que Ce Qu'Elle
programme.desc:
Candice Renoir: Created by Robin Barataud, Brigitte Peskine, Solen Roy-Pagenault. With Cécile Bois, Raphaël Lenglet, Clara Antoons, Ali Marhyar. The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine is between solving crimes, taking out fights with her much younger female police superior officer, getting her kids to school - in addition - handling their problems too and keeping her team in line. It's a very funny and witty series with a lot of french charm and intelligent story writing. Not another dull crime series all over again. It's like a fresh french breeze on the TV screen. Candice is like a female Columbo version in high heels, handbag pink scarf and a 9mm in her holster." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2819924/","name":"Candice Renoir","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM3YzUxM2UtZjIyMC00Zjg5LTk0NTMtNGQ3ZWQ0ODhlMTJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc0NTExNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. To be honest, I'm not a fan of the genre. Nothing against strong and independent women, au contraire. I just prefer decent detective work above being sucked into the personal life of a fictional character. If I wanted to see family drama I'd go watch a sitcom. It's beyond me why the detective genre has to be muddled with sitcom-esque fluff like this. (I wouldn't buy it, but it's programmed on TV *instead* of a proper detective). I can accept a modest degree of family life. After all, Beck and Wallander have families too. However, they are primarily detectives, and every episode is about solving the case. 

"Candice Renoir" is more sitcom than detectives. And it's just as tacky and kitschy as the name already suggests. A fifty-something big mama, who seems to think she's Brigitte Bardot in the seventies, miraculously becomes the team leader of a small town detective team. She blunders through everything, but 'magically' finds clues in fashion magazines and the likes. She's supposed to portray the strong and independent older woman who can do it all, kids and playing the boss- detective, but it's way to contrived to be the least bit believable. Her character, the rainbow team, the younger cutesy neighbour - who has stamped "love interest" in all caps across his handsome forehead - it's all a stylised light version of a concept we've seen many, many times before. And now it's here again, only worse. Yay. 

To be fair, the acting of the team and other characters varies from passable to decent, but the lead actress is really milking the diva character, and as such, overacting horribly in just about every scene.

It might just about do as daytime TV, on a rainy afternoon, but that's probably me being generous.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":1,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1069,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5,"contentRating":"TV-G","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2013-04-19","keywords":"france,female police officer,police","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0092291/","name":"Cécile Bois","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0501845/","name":"Raphaël Lenglet","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6511436/","name":"Clara Antoons"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0011107/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0053077/","name":"Robin Barataud","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0043904/","name":"Brigitte Peskine","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2784794/","name":"Solen Roy-Pagenault"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Promo Bande-annonce [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2892283161","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FhNWFlYmItYmE5My00ZmM0LThlZDctZGE5YjhiMThkZDQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FhNWFlYmItYmE5My00ZmM0LThlZDctZGE5YjhiMThkZDQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""</script><metacontent=" --- Director: Pascal Lahmani, Nicolas Picard-Dreyfuss, Stéphane Malhuret, Olivier Barma, Raphaël Lenglet

programme.title: Hailey Dean Mystery: Herança Fatal
programme.desc: Hailey, uma antiga procuradora do Ministério Público, utiliza as suas competências e os seus contactos quando a sua amiga Pam desaparece enquanto tratava de vender a grande propriedade dos pais, já falecidos.

programme.title: Hailey Dean Mystery: Encontro de Morte
programme.desc: Uma aplicação de encontros é capaz de matar. Quando Hailey começa a investigar o homicídio, suspeita que o crime tenha tido origem numa crítica negativa, mas mais tarde percebe que alguém anda a matar por outra razão.

programme.title: 28 Dias
programme.desc: Gwen Cummings, uma jornalista de Nova Iorque, vive para se divertir, ultrapassando todos os limites. É bonita e bem-sucedida, mas tem problemas com o álcool. Quando foge com a limusina do casamento da irmã e bate numa varanda, é condenada pelo tribunal a passar 28 dias numa clínica de reabilitação.

programme.title: Candice Renoir
Candice Renoir
programme.desc:
Candice Renoir: Created by Robin Barataud, Brigitte Peskine, Solen Roy-Pagenault. With Cécile Bois, Raphaël Lenglet, Clara Antoons, Ali Marhyar. The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine is between solving crimes, taking out fights with her much younger female police superior officer, getting her kids to school - in addition - handling their problems too and keeping her team in line. It's a very funny and witty series with a lot of french charm and intelligent story writing. Not another dull crime series all over again. It's like a fresh french breeze on the TV screen. Candice is like a female Columbo version in high heels, handbag pink scarf and a 9mm in her holster." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2819924/","name":"Candice Renoir","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM3YzUxM2UtZjIyMC00Zjg5LTk0NTMtNGQ3ZWQ0ODhlMTJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc0NTExNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. With Cécile Bois, Raphaël Lenglet, Clara Antoons, Ali Marhyar. The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice is like a female Columbo version in high heels, handbag pink scarf and a 9mm in her holster." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2819924/","name":"Candice Renoir","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM3YzUxM2UtZjIyMC00Zjg5LTk0NTMtNGQ3ZWQ0ODhlMTJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc0NTExNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine ","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2819924/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Doctor_Dexter","dateCreated":"2016-06-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"The female sitcom-detective cliché","reviewBody":"Over the last decades, in Europe, we've been swamped with the older female detective character with a family in tow. Some have a weak excuse for a husband to emphasise their strength, many others are independent single mothers who struggle with a demanding job and raising their kids. To be honest, I'm not a fan of the genre. Nothing against strong and independent women, au contraire. I just prefer decent detective work above being sucked into the personal life of a fictional character. If I wanted to see family drama I'd go watch a sitcom. It's beyond me why the detective genre has to be muddled with sitcom-esque fluff like this. (I wouldn't buy it, but it's programmed on TV *instead* of a proper detective). I can accept a modest degree of family life. After all, Beck and Wallander have families too. However, they are primarily detectives, and every episode is about solving the case. 

"Candice Renoir" is more sitcom than detectives. And it's just as tacky and kitschy as the name already suggests. A fifty-something big mama, who seems to think she's Brigitte Bardot in the seventies, miraculously becomes the team leader of a small town detective team. She blunders through everything, but 'magically' finds clues in fashion magazines and the likes. She's supposed to portray the strong and independent older woman who can do it all, kids and playing the boss- detective, but it's way to contrived to be the least bit believable. Her character, the rainbow team, the younger cutesy neighbour - who has stamped "love interest" in all caps across his handsome forehead - it's all a stylised light version of a concept we've seen many, many times before. And now it's here again, only worse. Yay. 

To be fair, the acting of the team and other characters varies from passable to decent, but the lead actress is really milking the diva character, and as such, overacting horribly in just about every scene.

It might just about do as daytime TV, on a rainy afternoon, but that's probably me being generous.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":1,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1069,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5,"contentRating":"TV-G","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2013-04-19","keywords":"france,female police officer,police","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0092291/","name":"Cécile Bois","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0501845/","name":"Raphaël Lenglet","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6511436/","name":"Clara Antoons"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0011107/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0053077/","name":"Robin Barataud","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0043904/","name":"Brigitte Peskine","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2784794/","name":"Solen Roy-Pagenault"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Promo Bande-annonce [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2892283161","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FhNWFlYmItYmE5My00ZmM0LThlZDctZGE5YjhiMThkZDQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FhNWFlYmItYmE5My00ZmM0LThlZDctZGE5YjhiMThkZDQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""</script><metacontent=" --- Director: Pascal Lahmani, Nicolas Picard-Dreyfuss, Stéphane Malhuret, Olivier Barma, Raphaël Lenglet

https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM3YzUxM2UtZjIyMC00Zjg5LTk0NTMtNGQ3ZWQ0ODhlMTJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc0NTExNDI@._V1_QL75_UY281_CR1,0,190,281_.jpg

programme.title: Dizem Por Aí...
programme.desc: Sarah Huttinger concordou em casar, mas está apavorada com a ideia. A sua carreira de jornalista estagnou na página de obituário do New York Times. A sua irmã Annie decidiu casar-se com o parceiro de ténis e Sarah vai ter que assistir ao enlace, o que significa passar tempo com a sua família...

programme.title: Mulheres!
programme.desc: Mary é uma mulher moderna, casada com Stephen, um homem de negócios nova-iorquino. Fiel ao marido e mãe de uma filha, está rodeada das suas "amigas". Mas elas sabem uma coisa que ela ignora: O marido anda a traí-la com Crystal Allen.

programme.title: Instinto Fatal
programme.desc: Johnny Boz, uma antiga estrela rock e proprietário de clubes noturnos, é encontrado morto na sua cama, assassinado com um picador de gelo. O caso é entregue ao toxicómano em recuperação Nick Curran, sendo que a namorada Catherine Tramell é a principal suspeita.

programme.title: A Crueldade de Peter
programme.desc: No início do século XX, Peter, o filho de 13 anos de uma rica família inglesa, é cruel com as crianças, os animais e os criados. Uma noite, em retaliação pela sua crueldade, é emboscado, atirado para um caixão enterrado no cemitério e esquecido. Até que um século depois ele é reencontrado...

programme.title: Fúria Aérea
programme.desc: Um militar americano que massacrou uma aldeia é forçado a assumir a culpa em tribunal mas acaba por se evadir, reunir o seu grupo de homens e sequestrar o avião onde viaja o oficial que deu a ordem para os crimes. Agora cabe a Matt Marshall tentar entrar no avião em pleno voo e evitar a tragédia.

programme.title: Salvar o Natal
programme.desc: Danny é um miúdo que tenta provar a existência do Pai Natal quando a irmã diz que já não acredita nele. Agora, com o auxílio dos seus melhores amigos e recorrendo a tecnologia de ponta que eles próprios fabricaram, vai partir numa jornada para encontrar a verdade sobre o velhinho da barba branca.

programme.title: Fintar o Destino
programme.desc: Mané foi um futebolista famoso em Cabo Verde mas perdeu a oportunidade de sair da sua terra para ir jogar para o Benfica e nunca conseguiu ultrapassar a sensação de frustração e oportunidade perdida. Agora, aos 50 anos, vai tentar o impossível e parte para Lisboa.

programme.title: Evereste
programme.desc: Inspirado na história verídica de uma expedição ao cume do Evereste, que terminou em tragédia. Os alpinistas foram apanhados de surpresa por uma violenta tempestade de neve.

programme.title: Le Chant du Loup - Ameaça em Alto Mar
programme.desc: Chanteraide tem o raro dom de conseguir identificar todos os sons que ouve. A bordo de um submarino nuclear francês, tudo depende dele, só que, reputado como infalível, ele acaba por cometer um erro que coloca toda a equipa em perigo de morte.

programme.title: Asher: Redenção de um Hitman
programme.desc: Asher é um hitman envelhecido que passou a maior parte da vida a eliminar outras vidas. Num último trabalho que não corre bem, Asher é confrontado com a realidade e tem que se redimir: para ser o homem que deseja ser, tem de eliminar o homem que foi.

programme.title: Tubarão 3
programme.desc: No SeaWorld, da Flórida, um novo e engenhoso "Reino Subaquático" está prestes a ser inaugurado. Enquanto os visitantes atravessam os túneis, um tubarão-branco, preso na lagoa, devora tudo o que possa impedir a sua fuga. O medo instala-se e uma maré de pânico espalha-se pela multidão de turistas!

programme.title: Segurança Nacional
programme.desc: Eles têm apenas uma coisa em comum: foram rejeitados pelo Departamento de Polícia de Los Angeles! Um foi expulso e o outro nem foi admitido. Mas quando Earl e Hank se juntam como seguranças, ninguém está seguro! Juntos, mas não por opção, têm debaixo de olho o homem que matou o parceiro de Hank.

programme.title: Showtime
programme.desc: Um polícia branco e um polícia negro são obrigados a participar no programa 'Showtime' para melhorar a imgem da autoridade.

programme.title: De Repente, Já nos 30!
programme.desc: Jenna, de 13 anos, sente-se sufocada pelos pais, ignorada pelos colegas e, no dia do seu aniversário, é trancada dentro de um armário. Aí, ela deseja ser adulta e ter a vida com que sempre sonhou. Quando sai do armário, o seu desejo foi realizado. Mas Jenna sente a falta de Matt, o seu único amigo.

programme.title: Instinto Fatal
programme.desc: Johnny Boz, uma antiga estrela rock e proprietário de clubes noturnos, é encontrado morto na sua cama, assassinado com um picador de gelo. O caso é entregue ao toxicómano em recuperação Nick Curran, sendo que a namorada Catherine Tramell é a principal suspeita.

programme.title: Vendeta
programme.desc: Richard vai com os amigos fazer uma caçada no deserto, mas decide ir uns dias antes com a amiga Jen. Os amigos chegam mais cedo e a situação descontrola-se. A presa passa a ser humana. Jen vai mostrar o incrível sabor da vingança de uma mulher.

programme.title: Braven
programme.desc: Quando Joe Braven, um humilde lenhador, se vê confrontado com um grupo de traficantes de droga, na sua cabana isolada nas montanhas, vai fazer tudo para proteger a sua família... Até mesmo caçar!

programme.title: O Duro de São Francisco
programme.desc: Matt Sorenson, um ex-pugilista e polícia que hoje trabalha como cobrador de dívidas, infiltra-se no submundo do sadomasoquismo em busca de vingança pelos responsáveis pela morte do irmão.

programme.title: Diários de Che Guevara
programme.desc: Ernesto Che Guevara e o seu amigo Alberto Granado partem para uma viagem de 8000 quilómetros numa velha moto, carinhosamente apelidada de "La Poderosa". Che era, em 1952, um jovem de classe social abastada a um passo de terminar o curso de medicina, mas a realidade da América Latina muda a sua vida.

programme.title: As Boas Intenções
programme.desc: Uma mulher de 50 anos, fortemente empenhada no trabalho humanitário que desenvolve, dá por si a competir com os colegas do centro social onde trabalha. Começa então a ministrar um curso, com a ajuda de um monitor duvidoso, sobre o código da estrada...

programme.title: O Último Imperador
programme.desc: Depois de ser capturado como criminoso de guerra em 1950 pelo Exército Vermelho, Pu-Yi, o último imperador da China, recorda a sua vida desde a infância opulenta e resguardada na Cidade Proibida até à revolução que provocou uma reviravolta no país e lhe mudou dramaticamente a vida.

programme.title: Auggie
programme.desc: Forçado a uma reforma antecipada, Felix Gresystone apaixona-se por uma jovem em realidade virtual, esquecendo a sua relação com a mulher e a filha.

programme.title: A Cura
programme.desc: Num futuro próximo e muito negro, um ex-lutador pela liberdade é forçado a voltar à ação quando descobre um segredo perturbador, que pode deitar abaixo a empresa farmacêutica que controla o mundo por deter o controlo da vacina para a pandemia que devastou o planeta.

programme.title: A Lagoa Azul
programme.desc: Dois jovens náufragos dão à costa numa remota e selvagem ilha. Em conjunto, a dupla vai crescer e aprender tudo sobre a sobrevivência e o amor.

programme.title: Os Anjos de Charlie
programme.desc: O empresário Eric Knox tem em seu poder um programa informático capaz de identificar pela voz, uma aplicação que pode ser perigosa se cair nas mãos erradas. Este é um trabalho para Natalie, Dylan e Alex, que são peritas em artes marciais e nem precisam de armas para fazer frente ao inimigo!

programme.title: O Medalhão
programme.desc: O detetive Eddie Yang sofre um acidente e morre, mas volta à vida com a ajuda de um medalhão, que dá poderes sobrenaturais ao seu detentor. Em conjunto com uma agente da Interpol, Eddie vai tentar descobrir os segredos do artefacto e derrotar o malvado "Cabeça de Cobra".

programme.title: O Grande Mestre dos Lutadores
programme.desc: Um jovem indisciplinado, que está sempre a meter-se em sarilhos, vai ser forçado a aprender, da forma mais dura e rigorosa, um estilo secreto de "drunken boxing" para conseguir enfrentar um assassino.

programme.title: T-34
programme.desc: Em 1944, o comandante russo Nikolai Ivushkin, que está há três anos prisioneiro dos nazis, lidera um grupo corajoso de soldados e prepara uma audaciosa fuga ao cativeiro alemão num tanque T-34 meio destruído.

programme.title: Million Dollar Baby - Sonhos Vencidos
programme.desc: Frankie Dunn foi agente e treinador dos melhores pugilistas, numa vida passada nos ringues de boxe. Na sequência do doloroso afastamento da sua filha, Frankie revela uma já longa dificuldade na aproximação aos outros. Já Maggie sabe bem o que quer e tem a determinação necessária para o alcançar.

programme.title: FBI
FBI
programme.desc:
FBI: Created by Craig Turk, Dick Wolf. With Missy Peregrym, Zeeko Zaki, Jeremy Sisto, Ebonee Noel. Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7491982/","name":"FBI","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5Mjg5NDk4OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjY1ODIyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7491982/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"altereggo123"},"dateCreated":"2018-11-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"Wow. Shocking how bad this is. So disappointing!","reviewBody":"I expect a certain amount of political correctness from a Dick Wolf show. In Law & Order, it was common for the initial suspect--a low level hood from the ghetto--to be innocent, with the ultimate criminal turning out to be a wealthy white executive/headmaster/philanthropist/politician/stereotypical elitist. By now, I expect any crime show on any network in the US and the UK to have ethnically diverse investigators reporting to a female commander. But as long as the plots make sense and the serious dialogue is leavened with humor, I can put up with all the calibrated political correctness. I've watched a lot of these shows over the years, notwithstanding their occasional triteness.

This show is PC on steroids. It's is the first show I've ever seen in which MS-13 members are victims. There is a point where the political messaging just gets so tiresome and tendentious that it results in ridiculous plots, terrible dialogue, and total inauthenticity.

I hoped this show would be entertaining even if it wasn't exactly Masterpiece-just ordinary, decent TV. Instead. it is so stupid that it's unwatchable. How could a show with its pedigree go so wrong?"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":13074,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-09-25","keywords":"violence,police investigation,copaganda,fbi agent,fbi federal bureau of investigation","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1335291/","name":"Missy Peregrym"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4976368/","name":"Zeeko Zaki"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005438/","name":"Jeremy Sisto"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019598/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0274041/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046592/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1541762/","name":"Craig Turk"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0937725/","name":"Dick Wolf"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi251968281","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""}}</script><metacontent="

Shocking how bad this is. So disappointing!","reviewBody":"I expect a certain amount of political correctness from a Dick Wolf show. In Law & Order, it was common for the initial suspect--a low level hood from the ghetto--to be innocent, with the ultimate criminal turning out to be a wealthy white executive/headmaster/philanthropist/politician/stereotypical elitist. By now, I expect any crime show on any network in the US and the UK to have ethnically diverse investigators reporting to a female commander. But as long as the plots make sense and the serious dialogue is leavened with humor, I can put up with all the calibrated political correctness. I've watched a lot of these shows over the years, notwithstanding their occasional triteness.

This show is PC on steroids. It's is the first show I've ever seen in which MS-13 members are victims. There is a point where the political messaging just gets so tiresome and tendentious that it results in ridiculous plots, terrible dialogue, and total inauthenticity.

I hoped this show would be entertaining even if it wasn't exactly Masterpiece-just ordinary, decent TV. Instead. it is so stupid that it's unwatchable.
